main.name: Christine Yang
main.description: who is interested in Web Development, Data Mining and Machine Learning, but also open to gaining further knowledge in all fields of technology
main.bio: I am a Computer Science Major at Western University, where I have gained experience with Python, Java and group coding projects. I was VP Finance and a volunteer of Musicbox Western, which is an organization that provides free musicbox lessons to vulnerable children. I'm also a member of the Women in Tech Society.
main.hobbies: In my free time I enjoy baking various desserts. I also like working out through running or swimming. When I'm feeling lazy, I prefer to pass time watching TV shows, and listening to music (with the shows and artists to the right). As a CS major, I like learning new technologies and coding small projects based on these tools.

education.description: Relevant Courses: Data Structures and Algorithms, Operating Systems, Analysis of Algorithms, Software Project Management & Project Management for the Sciences
